title: element/method access of type identifier produces unhelpful error
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

Compile this (6g):

package foo
type t struct {}
func fn() { _ = t.bar }

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Expect some useful error message, instead get:

foo.go:3: internal compiler error: fault

This also occurs if you try a method call, t.bar().
